error-return-home: Return to the home page 返回主页
carousel-list-a: Programmable liquidity 可编程的流动性
carousel-list-b: All-new Rust code 全新 Rust 代码编
carousel-list-d: Easy dapp integration 轻易 dapp 集成
collaborators-desc-a: team has extensive experience working with a wide array of token-based projects to engineer rational and balanced network economies that promote organic ecosystem growth. Clients include Axie Infinity (AXS), Synthetix (SNX), Aave (AAVE), Nervos (CKB) and Skale (SKL). 该团队在发展项目方拥有丰富的经验，并能促进生态系统的自然发展。 客户包括Axie Infinity (AXS), Synthetix (SNX), Aave (AAVE), Nervos (CKB) 和 Skale (SKL)。
collaborators-desc-b: invests in early-stage distributed web startups and co-create with them to launch new products and protocols. Partners include Handshake (HNS), PoolTogether (POOL), Instadapp (INST), Near (NEAR) and Optimism. 有投资初步网络创业公司，并与他们合作发展新产品和程序。合作伙伴包括 Handshake (HNS), PoolTogether (POOL), Instadapp (INST), Near (NEAR) 和 Optimism
collaborators-desc-c: incubates foundational protocols on the Terra blockchain including Mirror (MIR), Anchor (ANC) and Chai. 在Terra 区块链培育了许多基础程序如：Mirror (MIR), Anchor (ANC) 与 Chai.
comingsoon-desc-b: Astroport removes the complexity of advanced yield farming strategies to deliver optimized, sustainable yield for users Astroport 删除了收益策略的复杂性，并为用户提供优化和可持续的利益。
comingsoon-desc-c: Astroport’s first product will be focus on borrow strategies which are available within the Terra ecosystem. The protocol will evolve and develop new vault strategies through community governance proposals and grants over time  Astroport 第一个产品将会专注于Terra生态系统内的借贷策略。该程序会逐渐地通过社区治理提案和赠款来研发出新的仓库政策。
content-desc-a: The next evolution in DEXes 下一代分散式交易平台
content-desc-b: Written from scratch in Rust, Astroport combines the best pieces of six years of development on the Ethereum blockchain and delivers it on Terra. Astroport使用了Rust程序语言编写，综合了六年在Ethereum区块链上开发的做好部分，并将此在Terra上推出。
content-desc-c: It supports two liquidity pool types: 它支持两种流动池：
content-desc-d: Uniswap’s Constant Product formula pools Uniswap 的恒积流动池
content-desc-e: Curve’s StableSwap Invariant formula pools Curve 的稳定兑换不变式流动池
content-desc-f: It’s backwards compatible with Terraswap message formats and features and a next-generation user interface. 它后端与 Terraswap 信息格式兼容，并提供下一代用户界面。
content-desc-g: Where traders and LPs meet 交易者与代币流动性提供者在此相遇
content-desc-h: The marketplace never closes on Astroport. Anyone can set up a merchant stall by supplying liquidity in one of two pools. Then, anyone else can trade against those tokens at any time. Astroport市场是永远开放的。任何人可以在这两个池中的一个来提供流动性。然后，任何人可以随时与这些代币进行交易。。
content-desc-i: LPs earn fees. And at launch, they can provide liquidity to earn ASTRO, too. Since all of Astroport’s liquidity lives in smart contracts, it’s programmable. 流动性提供者将会赚取费用。
content-desc-j: Other Terra-based dapps can integrate Astroport liquidity directly into their platforms. That means traders throughout the Terra ecosystem always have access to your liquidity. 其他在Terra运作的应用程序可以直接融入Astroport内的代币流动性。这代表Terra 生态系统内的交易者永远可以接入您的流动性。
content-link-a: Launch app 启动应用程序
content-link-c: Provide liquidity 提供代币流动性
footer-desc-a: Astroport brings liquidity to Terra tokens from all parts of the galaxy. Astroport把流动性带给所有Terra代币
footer-desc-b: Enter App 进入应用程序
footer-link-e: Terms of use 使用条款
hero-header: Astroport. The future of trading Astroport. 交易的未来。
immunefi-desc-a: Get paid up to $3,000,000 可得到 $3，000，000 酬报。
immunefi-desc-b: if you discover bugs and vulnerabilities on Astroport. 诺您在Astroport发现漏洞.
intro-desc-b: Terra ecosystem Terra 生态系统上
intro-desc-c: Astroport is a neutral marketplace where anyone, from anywhere in the galaxy Astroport是个中性的交易所，任何人
intro-desc-d: can dock to trade their wares. 可以随意兑换资产
intro-desc-e: Decentralized, permissionless and open-source 分散式，无需经过应许和开源
intro-desc-f: Astroport’s marketplace is a public good governed by its community of Astroport的交易所是由自己代币拥持者
livebanner-title: Astro Drop is Live Astro 空投可以领取

tcbanner-body: I have read and agree to be bound by the Terms & Conditions. 我已阅读与理解该平台的条款和条件，并同意遵守。
vaults-desc-a: Generates yield by maximizing Anchor Borrow loan-to-value (LTV) ratio to capture borrower incentive tokens while automatically protecting user from liquidation risk.  完全利用 Anchor 贷款成数 （LTV）比例来获取贷款者的奖励代币，并同时保护用户免受清算风险，以生产收益。
vaults-desc-b: Generates yield by operating an automated delta neutral yield strategy for UST in Mirror Finance. 运作一个在 Mirror Finance上自动化delta中性UST收益政策.
